blogPost.excerpt: Alertly is your personalized slack bot for getting JIRA alerts. Set up important reminders, which are actionable and personalized so that the right person gets notified, all from Slack!
blogPost.body: Alertly is your personalized slack bot for getting JIRA alerts. Set up important reminders, which are actionable and personalized so that the right person gets notified, all from Slack!
blogPost.title: Alertly.io - Your personalized slack bot for JIRA alerts
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Alertly是您个性化的Slack机器人，用于获取JIRA提醒。设置重要的提醒，这些提醒是可操作的和个性化的，以便正确的人得到通知，所有这些都来自Slack!
localize.tagline: 您个性化的JIRA警报懒惰机器人

localize.description: Alertly是您個性化的Slack機器人，用於獲取JIRA提醒。設置重要的提醒，這些提醒是可操作的和個性化的，以便正確的人得到通知，所有這些都來自Slack!
localize.tagline: 您個性化的JIRA警報懶惰機器人

previous.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 55 days in a row, down 70% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/w4TcwPL868

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已连续55天下降，比1月6日的峰值下降了70%。🙏 https://t.co/w4TcwPL868。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已連續55天下降，比1月6日的峯值下降了70%。🙏 https://t.co/w4TcwPL868。

next.excerpt: https://100project.co is the world’s first crowdsourced NFT, a truly collective work of art. Once all pieces are filled, the final artwork will be minted as an NFT, with profits going to the owners of each piece if sold—so buying a piece is also an investment.
next.title: 100 Project - The world's first crowdsourced NFT

localize.description: https://100project.co 是世界上第一个众包的NFT，是一个真正的集体艺术品。一旦所有作品被填满，最终的艺术品将被铸成NFT，如果售出，利润将归每件作品的所有者所有--所以购买一件作品也是一种投资。
https://100project.co 是世界上第一個衆包的NFT，是一個真正的集體藝術品。一旦所有作品被填滿，最終的藝術品將被鑄成NFT，如果售出，利潤將歸每件作品的所有者所有--所以購買一件作品也是一種投資。
